title.narrative: Nigeria COVID-19 Preparedness and Response Project

activity-date.narrative: Actual start date of the activity
Planned end date of the activity
Actual end date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

title.narrative: Number of states that have an established EOC and activated IMS for COVID-19
Number of states with at least three functional Isolation/ treatment/ community support centres with holding area for the management of COVID -19 patients
Number of states with at least one state-owned laboratory with capacity to perform diagnosis of COVID-19 according to national guidelines
Percentage of contacts of confirmed cases reached and followed up
Number of diagnosed cases treated at the designated isolation or treatment center per national protocols
Number of health workers trained in infection prevention and control per national protocols
Number of states with M&E system developed and is being implemented to monitor COVID-19 preparedness and response plan.
Number of states with functional transfer systems for COVID-19 patients
Number of states reporting designated isolation /treatment facilities reported supervisory visit in the previous quarter
Number of states with at least fifty health centers with triage capacity
Number of states adopting IEC /BCC guidelines according to national protocol for COVID-19 response.
Number of states reporting designated isolation/treatment facilities with no stock out of basic IPC and WASH commodities in the previous quarter
Number of states with platforms for reporting SEA and gender related complaints according to guiding national protocol.
Number of states having adopted health strategy adopting measures to address climate risks
Number of states reporting both treatment and laboratory data using SORMAS
Percentage of testing labs with at least 90% of samples with turn-around-time of 48 hours between sample collection and delivery ofresult
